title: Raspberry marshmallows
description: Making your own marshmallows needs a little bit of patience and a couple of gadgets, but it’s a lot of fun. Try this raspberry ripple version of these soft chewy treats.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a freestanding mixer or electric whisk and a sugar thermometer.
ingredients: 1 sachet of powdered gelatine or 4 gelatine leaves
